thread.title: Cute dog helps little brother with anxiety - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Cute dog helps little brother with anxiety - Yahoo7

author: Sunrise On February
title: Cute dog helps little brother with anxiety - Yahoo7
text:
Share Cute dog helps little brother with anxiety - Yahoo7 
Kiko is a dog that battles with anxiety. He has trouble trusting other dogs, making it hard for him to enjoy life. So his brother Watson makes it his mission to help. Close Dog helps brother with anxiety UP NEXT VIDEO 
"Some of you read Kiko's story in our feed not to long ago. And Learned that Kiko wasn't with me for three long years and I thought I wasn't going to see him again." Owner of the two golden retrievers in Washington wrote on Instagram. Source: @wat.ki 
"Also know that Watson is like Kiko's therapy dog. Watson helps Kiko with his anxieties and teach him to trust other dogs. That life can be fun and joyful if you get out there learn how to love and trust." Source: @wat.ki 
"[This] video show[s] the strong bond that these two golden retriever brothers have and how their friendship and love for each other is everything." 
These brothers melted our hearts! Follow their journey on Instagram.
